name: City Rampage
description:
Welcome to City Rampage.

Use WASD to move, Q to switch weapons, R to reload, V to enter a vehicle, & SPACE to shoot.

City Rampage is heavily inspired by Grand Theft Auto (1997) but updated with some new features and a low-poly 3D art style. As a player, you enter the city and try to steal as many cars and cause as much damage as you can before the police take you out. How high of a score can you get?

Gameplay: 

This game was made by Jordan Grayson, Ethan Zarov, and Dayoon Lee.
